ooC: I've been away for the last 4 days or so, and I'm a little lost 
as do what happened to Scryed's pod and such. (I should really tell 
people when i'm leaving for a few days... lol)


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Blackfang: Okay... let's see... Wow... this thing really is an 
> antiquity! I'll try to bring it back online and search for a DNA 
form.
> 
> He pops a small panel on the side of the pod and taps some keys. 
The 
> report comes in a few moments later, but slower than he expected.
> 
> Blackfang: The power seems depleted, but not completely. 
> Surprisingly... it already scanned a mode. There has been damage 
to 
> the protoform, but they have been repaired. My guess is that's 
what 
> depleted the power source. I wonder if it will hold long enough to 
get 
> the robot out safely...
